news_insight_text_link.news_insight_description: Koa Switzerland introduced a new cocoa-fruit frappé in partnership with Knoops, marking a significant product launch. This innovation is gaining attention in the U.K., showcasing Koa Switzerland's expansion into new market segments with sustainable fruit juice products.

overview_description.description:
Take the chance to experience a unique addition to your world of flavors with the exotic taste of CocoA Juice. A taste that to date only reached the palates of just a few in the world.

CocoA Juice is captured directly on the farms in the middle of the Ghanaian rain forests. Our dedicated team on the ground extracts the juice together with traditional small scale farmers under hygienic and environmentally sustainable conditions.

In a completely redesigned process, we combine traditional organic farming practices with modern-day technology and methodologies -all the while reducing food waste, increasing livelihood on rural areas and at the same time carrying the unique taste of CocoA into the world.

CocoA's flavor originates from the pulp that surrounds the cocoa beans within the cocoa fruit. Through respectful cooperation with the cocoa farmers, our process neither interferes with traditional farming nor does it affect the quality of the beans, but generates an additional source of income for the hard-working farmers.

Our project is a real Win-Win for everyone. Not only does our project bring the world a new exotic flavor, but it's also rich in antioxidants, increases the income of Ghanaian Farmers, creates more jobs, utilizes 25% more of the fruit rather than the current 10% figure, and more.

properties.growth_insight_description: Koa Switzerland may be growing as it has successfully secured a significant amount of funding, specifically $15 million in a Series B round. This influx of capital indicates investor confidence and provides the means for potential expansion and development within the company. Furthermore, the funding is earmarked for expansion purposes, which suggests that Koa Switzerland is looking to increase its operational capacity or market reach. The additional financial resources could facilitate various growth-related activities such as scaling up production, entering new markets, or enhancing research and development efforts.

about_short_description.short_description: Koa is manufacturing fruit juice products.

product.name: Cocoa Fruit Juice
product.description: A beverage derived from the pulp of the cocoa fruit, offering a fresh and exotic taste.

product.name: Cocoa Fruit Juice Concentrate (Oabika)
product.description: A concentrated juice from the cocoa fruit, used as an ingredient in gastronomy for its rare fruity and tangy flavours.

product.name: Cocoa Fruit Balsamic Vinegar
product.description: A vinegar made from cocoa fruit, suitable for enhancing salads or meats, with transparency provided via blockchain.

product.name: Cocoa Fruit Powder
product.description: A powder made from dried cocoa fruit, used in various food products for its nutritional value.

product.name: Community Mobile Processing Unit (CMPU)
product.description: A mobile unit for processing cocoa fruit on-site with farmers, powered by solar energy.

product.name: Blockchain-based Payment Verification
product.description: A system that verifies payments to cocoa farmers for their cocoa fruit pulp using blockchain technology.
